alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 30 at 5:11PM CDT until March 31 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...In Alabama, Baldwin Inland, Baldwin Central and Baldwin Coastal Counties. In Florida, Escambia Inland and Escambia Coastal Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until midnight CDT tonight. For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Baldwin Inland
